channel.title: Category Idea - Community Polls
channel.description:
An idea I had been thinking about is community polls. This category would be used to instigate thought-provoking discussion, get the community's opinions on controversial topics, or just have some fun seeing what the community likes to do. Examples would be [ul][li]'What is your favourite color?'[/li] [li]'Do you play RS07 or EOC?'[/li] [li]'Do you agree with [country]'s use of [item] on [something]?'[/li] [li]'What of the following is your dream job?'[/li] [li]'Preferred programming language?'[/li][/ul]
Thoughts?
